text: Simone van de Kraats (born November 15, 2000) is a Dutch water polo player. She plays for the Netherlands women's national water polo team. She participated at the 2019 World Water Polo Championship. == Career == She plays for Ede Polar Bears. She previously played for De Waterkip. With Polar Bears, she won the Dutch championship in 2018. == References == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch water polo players Category:Olympians for the Netherlands
title: Simone van de Kraats
